sqlMap.sql: m.t0_MENGE, m.t0_MATKL, m.t0_SORTF, m.t0_LGORT, m.t0_ZBZ, m.t0_ZRZQD, m.t0_CUID, m.t0_IDNRK, m.t0_ORDER_ID, m.t0_AUFNR, m.t0_ARBPL, m.t0_MATNR, m.t0_MAKTX1, m.t0_MAKTX2, m.t0_MSEHL1, m.t0_MSEHL2, m.t0_LABEL_CN, m.t0_SORTF_H, m.t0_MATNR1, m.t0_STORAGE_STATE, m.t0_STORAGE_NUM, m.t0_ZDTYL, m.t0_PLANT, m.t0_BATCH_NO, m.t0_OPERATE_TYPE, m.t0_POSNR, m.t0_MATKL_SELF
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL ( MENGE , MATKL , SORTF , LGORT , ZBZ , ZRZQD , CUID , IDNRK , ORDER_ID , AUFNR , ARBPL , MATNR , MAKTX1 , MAKTX2 , MSEHL1 , MSEHL2 , LABEL_CN , SORTF_H , MATNR1 , STORAGE_STATE , STORAGE_NUM , ZDTYL , PLANT , BATCH_NO , OPERATE_TYPE , POSNR , MATKL_SELF ) VALUES ( #menge# , #matkl# , #sortf# , #lgort# , #zbz# , #zrzqd# , #cuid# , #idnrk# , #orderId# , #aufnr# , #arbpl# , #matnr# , #maktx1# , #maktx2# , #msehl1# , #msehl2# , #labelCn# , #sortfH# , #matnr1# , #storageState# , #storageNum# , #zdtyl# , #plant# , #batchNo# , #operateType# , #posnr# , #matklSelf# )
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO ZG_T_ORDERBOM ( MENGE , MATKL , SORTF , LGORT , ZBZ , ZRZQD , CUID , IDNRK , ORDER_ID , AUFNR , ARBPL , MATNR , MAKTX1 , MAKTX2 , MSEHL1 , MSEHL2 , LABEL_CN , SORTF_H , MATNR1 , STORAGE_STATE , STORAGE_NUM , ZDTYL , POSNR , MATKL_SELF ) VALUES ( #menge# , #matkl# , #sortf# , #lgort# , #zbz# , #zrzqd# , #cuid# , #idnrk# , #orderId# , #aufnr# , #arbpl# , #matnr# , #maktx1# , #maktx2# , #msehl1# , #msehl2# , #labelCn# , #sortfH# , #matnr1# , #storageState# , #storageNum# , #zdtyl# , #posnr# , #matklSelf# )
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL SET MENGE = #menge# , MATKL = #matkl# , SORTF = #sortf# , LGORT = #lgort# , ZBZ = #zbz# , ZRZQD = #zrzqd# , IDNRK = #idnrk# , ORDER_ID = #orderId# , AUFNR = #aufnr# , ARBPL = #arbpl# , MATNR = #matnr# , MAKTX1 = #maktx1# , MAKTX2 = #maktx2# , MSEHL1 = #msehl1# , MSEHL2 = #msehl2# , LABEL_CN = #labelCn# , SORTF_H = #sortfH# , MATNR1 = #matnr1# , STORAGE_STATE = #storageState# , STORAGE_NUM = #storageNum# , ZDTYL = #zdtyl# , PLANT = #plant# , BATCH_NO = #batchNo# , OPERATE_TYPE = #operateType# , POSNR = #posnr# , MATKL_SELF = #matklSelf# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
sqlMap.select:
select
from (select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL, t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF, t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0 ) m where m.t0_CUID =#cuid#

select
from ( select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL, t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF, t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0 ) m
$sortColumns$

select
from ( select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL, t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF, t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0 ) m
$sortColumns$

select
from ( select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL, t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF, t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0 ) m

select
from ( select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL,
bom.SORTF as t0_SORTF,
t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF,
t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0,zg_t_orderbom bom where t0.idnrk=bom.idnrk(+) and nvl(t0.posnr,'null')=nvl(bom.posnr,'null') and t0.aufnr=bom.aufnr(+) and t0.aufnr = '$aufnr$' and t0.arbpl = '$arbpl$' and t0.plant = '$plant$' and t0.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and t0.operate_type ='$flag$' ) m

select t0.MENGE as t0_MENGE, t0.MATKL as t0_MATKL, t0.SORTF as t0_SORTF, t0.LGORT as t0_LGORT, t0.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, t0.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, t0.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, t0.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, t0.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, t0.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, t0.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, t0.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, t0.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, t0.POSNR as t0_POSNR, t0.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t0 where not exists (select 1 from zg_t_orderbom t where t.aufnr = '$aufnr$' and t.idnrk = t0.idnrk and nvl(t.posnr,'null') = nvl(t0.posnr,'null')) and t0.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and t0.aufnr = '$aufnr$'
t0.arbpl = '$arbpl$'
t0.plant = '$plant$'
and t0.operate_type is null

select ta.MENGE as t0_MENGE, ta.MATKL as t0_MATKL, ta.SORTF as t0_SORTF, bom.LGORT as t0_LGORT, ta.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, ta.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, bom.CUID as t0_CUID, ta.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, ta.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, ta.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, ta.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, ta.MATNR as t0_MATNR, ta.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, ta.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, ta.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, ta.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, ta.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, ta.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, ta.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, ta.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, ta.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, ta.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, ta.PLANT as t0_PLANT, ta.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, ta.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, ta.POSNR as t0_POSNR, ta.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from zg_t_orderbom_temp_all ta, zg_t_orderbom bom where ta.idnrk = bom.idnrk(+) and nvl(ta.posnr, 'null') = nvl(bom.posnr, 'null') and ta.aufnr = bom.aufnr(+) and ta.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and exists (select 1 from ( select t.ZDTYL, t.MENGE, t.MATKL, t.LGORT, t.ZRZQD, t.IDNRK, t.aufnr, t.ARBPL, t.MATNR, t.MSEHL1, t.MSEHL2, t.MATNR1, t.posnr from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t,zg_t_orderbom orderbom where t.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and t.operate_type is null and t.aufnr = '$aufnr$' and t.arbpl = '$arbpl$' and t.plant = '$plant$' and t.aufnr=orderbom.aufnr and t.idnrk=orderbom.idnrk and nvl(t.posnr,'null')=nvl(orderbom.posnr,'null') and orderbom.sortf='$sortf$' minus select ZDTYL, taskbom.menge, MATKL, LGORT, ZRZQD, IDNRK, task.aufnr, task.ARBPL, MATNR, MSEHL1, MSEHL2, MATNR1, posnr from ZG_T_ORDERBOM orderbom, zg_t_order_task task, zg_t_order_taskbom taskBom WHERE task.cuid = taskbom.order_task_id and taskbom.order_bom_id = orderbom.cuid and task.aufnr = '$aufnr$' and task.arbpl = '$arbpl$' and task.plant = '$plant$' ) m
where ta.idnrk = m.idnrk and ta.aufnr = m.aufnr and nvl(ta.posnr, 'null') = nvl(m.posnr, 'null') and ta.plant = '$plant$' and ta.arbpl = m.arbpl)

select ta.MENGE as t0_MENGE, ta.MATKL as t0_MATKL, ta.SORTF as t0_SORTF, ta.LGORT as t0_LGORT, ta.ZBZ as t0_ZBZ, ta.ZRZQD as t0_ZRZQD, bom.CUID as t0_CUID, ta.IDNRK as t0_IDNRK, ta.ORDER_ID as t0_ORDER_ID, ta.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, ta.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, ta.MATNR as t0_MATNR, ta.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, ta.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, ta.MSEHL1 as t0_MSEHL1, ta.MSEHL2 as t0_MSEHL2, ta.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, ta.SORTF_H as t0_SORTF_H, ta.MATNR1 as t0_MATNR1, ta.STORAGE_STATE as t0_STORAGE_STATE, ta.STORAGE_NUM as t0_STORAGE_NUM, ta.ZDTYL as t0_ZDTYL, ta.PLANT as t0_PLANT, ta.BATCH_NO as t0_BATCH_NO, ta.OPERATE_TYPE as t0_OPERATE_TYPE, ta.POSNR as t0_POSNR, ta.MATKL_SELF as t0_MATKL_SELF from zg_t_orderbom_temp_all ta, zg_t_orderbom bom where ta.idnrk = bom.idnrk and nvl(ta.posnr, 'null') = nvl(bom.posnr, 'null') and ta.aufnr = bom.aufnr(+)
and exists (select 1 from (
select ZDTYL, orderbom.menge, MATKL, LGORT, ZRZQD, IDNRK, orderbom.aufnr, MATNR, MSEHL1, MSEHL2, MATNR1, posnr from ZG_T_ORDERBOM orderbom WHERE orderbom.aufnr = '$aufnr$'
minus select t.ZDTYL, t.MENGE, t.MATKL, t.LGORT, t.ZRZQD, t.IDNRK, t.aufnr, t.MATNR, t.MSEHL1, t.MSEHL2, t.MATNR1, t.posnr from ZG_T_ORDERBOM_TEMP_ALL t where t.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and t.operate_type is null and t.aufnr = '$aufnr$'
) m
where ta.idnrk = m.idnrk and ta.aufnr = m.aufnr and nvl(ta.posnr, 'null') = nvl(m.posnr, 'null'))
and ta.batch_no = '$batchNo$' and ta.aufnr = '$aufnr$'
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE ZG_T_ORDERBOM SET MATKL = #matkl# , LGORT = #lgort# , ZBZ = #zbz# , ZRZQD = #zrzqd# , IDNRK = #idnrk# , AUFNR = #aufnr# , MATNR = #matnr# , MAKTX1 = #maktx1# , MAKTX2 = #maktx2# , MSEHL1 = #msehl1# , MSEHL2 = #msehl2# , LABEL_CN = #labelCn# , SORTF_H = #sortfH# , MATNR1 = #matnr1# , ZDTYL = #zdtyl# , POSNR = #posnr# WHERE aufnr=#aufnr# and idnrk=#idnrk#
posnr=#posnr#
posnr is null

UPDATE ZG_T_ORDERBOM SET MATKL = #matkl# , LGORT = #lgort# , ZBZ = #zbz# , ZRZQD = #zrzqd# , IDNRK = #idnrk# , AUFNR = #aufnr# , MATNR = #matnr# , MAKTX1 = #maktx1# , MAKTX2 = #maktx2# , MSEHL1 = #msehl1# , MSEHL2 = #msehl2# , LABEL_CN = #labelCn# , SORTF_H = #sortfH# , MATNR1 = #matnr1# , ZDTYL = #zdtyl# , POSNR = #posnr# , MENGE=#menge# WHERE aufnr=#aufnr# and idnrk=#idnrk#
posnr=#posnr#
posnr is null
sqlMap.select: select t.* from zg_t_bom_temp t where t.batch_no = '$cuid$' and not exists (select 1 from zg_t_bom bom where bom.type = '2' and bom.idnrk = t.idnrk and nvl(bom.plantid, 'null') = nvl(t.lifnr, 'null'))

select bt.* from zg_t_bom_temp bt where exists (select 1 from (select idnrk, maktx, msehl, matkl, zbz, zrzqd, lgort, plant, Plantid, MEINS from zg_t_bom t where t.type = '2' minus select temp.idnrk, temp.maktx2, temp.msehl2, temp.matkl, temp.zbz, temp.zrzqd, temp.lgort, Temp.name1, temp.lifnr, MEINS from zg_t_bom_temp temp where temp.batch_no = '$cuid$') w where w.idnrk = bt.idnrk and nvl(w.plantid, 'null') = nvl(bt.lifnr, 'null')) and bt.batch_no = '$cuid$'
sqlMap.insert:
insert into zg_t_bom(cuid,idnrk,maktx,msehl,matkl,zbz,zrzqd,lgort,plant,Plantid,TYPE,MEINS)
values (sys_guid(),'$IDNRK$','$MAKTX2$','$MSEHL2$','$MATKL$','$ZBZ$','$ZRZQD$','$LGORT$','$NAME1$','$LIFNR$','2','$MEINS$')
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update:
update zg_t_bom t set t.maktx = '$MAKTX2$', T.msehl = '$MSEHL2$', T.matkl = '$MATKL$', T.zbz = '$ZBZ$', T.zrzqd = 'ZRZQD', T.lgort = '$LGORT$', T.plant = '$NAME1$', T.MEINS = '$MEINS$' WHERE T.IDNRK = '$IDNRK$'
T.PLANTID = '$LIFNR$'
T.PLANTID is null
